japanese: （ん？　何か落ちてるな）
translation: (Hm? Something's fallen.)

japanese:
（ハンカチか。誰のだろう？
　俺やらいはじゃないとなると、
　あいつらのうちの誰かだろうが）
translation:
(A handkerchief, huh. I wonder whose it is?
 If it's not mine or Raiha's,
 it's got to be one of the quintuplets.

japanese: あっ！！
translation: AH!!

japanese: お、四葉。どうした？
translation: Oh, Yotsuba. What's up?

japanese: そ、そそそ、それはっ！！
translation: TH-TH-TH-TH-THAT'S!!

japanese: え？　これか？
translation: What? This?

japanese: それはどこで！？
translation: Where'd you find that?!

japanese: たった今ここで拾った。
translation: I picked it up here just now.

japanese:
なるほど！　たった今ですね！
だったらセーフです！
translation:
I see! Just now!
Then, everything is safe!

japanese: 何が？
translation: What?

japanese:
聞かないでください！
私の中ではセーフなんです！
translation:
Please don't ask!
Safe, everything is safe!

japanese: よくわからん……。
translation: I don't really get it...

japanese:
世の中にはわからないほうがいいことも
あるんですよ、上杉さん。
すべてを知ってしまうと不幸になるんです。
translation:
There are things in the world
that you shouldn't know, Uesugi-san.
If you know everything, you'll be unhappy.

japanese:
学生として知っておくべきことも覚えてないお前に
言われたくないぞ。
translation:
I don't want you to be the one telling me that.
A person who can't even remember what they
should know as a student.

japanese:
その点については努力します！
というわけですので、それを私に返してください！
translation:
I'm doing my best on that front!
Just for that, you should give it back!

japanese: どういうわけだ。
translation: Why?

japanese:
さあ！
大人しくこの手にそっと乗せてください！
translation:
Okay!
Please place it lightly in this hand.

japanese: ……ふっ。
translation: ...Hehe.

japanese: はっ！？
translation: OHH?!

japanese: ほーら、取ってみろ。
translation: ALRIGHT then, grab it.

japanese:
ちょ、ちょっと上杉さんっ！
これじゃ届きません！
translation:
H-hold on, Uesugi-san!
I can't reach it!

japanese:
いやいや、諦めるのは早いんじゃないか？
あらゆる可能性を検討し、
力の限り実行した上で判断するべきだ。
translation:
No no, it's too early to give up, isn't it?
All possibilities should be considered
and decided to the best of their ability.

japanese:
くうう～！
えいっ！　えいっ！　ていっ！
translation:
URRRGH!
Give! It! To! Me!

japanese:
どうした？　もう少しだぞ？
頑張れ四葉、ジャンプすればいけるんじゃないか？
translation:
What's wrong? Just a little further.
Come on Yotsuba,
wouldn't you be able to get it if you jumped?

japanese:
ジャンプしなくても
上杉さんが腕を下ろしてくれたら解決ですよ！？
translation:
It would be better
if you just lowered your arm, Uesugi-san!!
I wouldn't have to jump!

japanese:
すまんができんな。
今の俺は腕を下ろすと死んでしまう奇病に
かかってるんだ。
translation:
Sorry, but I can't.
Right now I'm afflicted with a strange disease
that'll kill me if I put my arm down.

japanese:
なんですと！？
そんな病が――
って、そんなわけないじゃないですか！
translation:
WHAT?!
That kind of disease...
wait, that can't be true!

japanese: さすがに騙されないか。
translation: You won't be fooled, huh.

japanese:
いくらなんでも騙されませんよっ！
もう！　早く返してくださいっ！
translation:
I won't be fooled no matter what!
Oh, come on! Give it back to me!

japanese: そんなに大切なものなのか？
translation: Is it that important to you?

japanese:
大切と言いますか、その、ええと、
子どもの頃からずっと使っていて
愛着があるのは確かなんですが……。
translation:
Important, I mean, well, I've been using it
since I was a child
and I'm sure I have an attachment to it...

japanese: そういや、お前は物持ちがいいんだったな。
translation:
Speaking of that, you're able to keep things
for a long time, aren't you.

japanese:
そうです、使えなくなるまで
大切に使ってあげたいので返していただけますと……。
translation:
That's right,
I use it very carefully until I can't any more,
so please return it to me...

japanese: よし、その気持ちを込めてジャンプだ！
translation: Alright, now jump with feeling this time!

japanese: かーえーしーてーくーだーさーいっ！
translation: G-I-V-E I-T B-A-C-K!!

japanese:
わかったわかった。
このくらいにしておいてやろう。
translation:
I got it, I got it.
I'll leave it at that.

japanese: はあ、やっと取り返せました。
translation: *sigh* I finally got it back.

japanese: あれ？　これ、ハンカチですか？
translation: Huh? Is this a handkerchief?

japanese:
ああ、ハンカチだ。
お前が落としたんだろ。
translation:
Yeah, it's a handkerchief.
You dropped it, right?

japanese:
ええええ～！？
ハンカチならハンカチだって最初に言ってください！
translation:
WHAAAA?!
If it's a handkerchief,
you should have said so from the start!!

japanese:
いや聞かれてないし。
なんと勘違いしたんだよ。
translation:
Well, you didn't ask.
You must have misunderstood.

japanese: そ、それは……！
translation: Th-that's!

japanese:
うううう～！
上杉さんの意地悪星人！
translation:
Ooooohhh!
You are such a meanie!
